name: Proportions of men or women who had ever married by a certain age for 1980 birth cohort
descriptionShort: The percentage of men or women born in a specific year who have ever married by a certain age.
descriptionFromProducer:
Marriage statistics are derived from information recorded when marriages are legally registered as part of civil registration.

Figures represent civil and religious marriages that take place in England and Wales only. Marriages to residents of England and Wales that take place outside of England and Wales are not included while marriages that take place in England and Wales to non-residents are included.

Marriages of same-sex couples first took place on 29 March 2014. Figures for 2014 represent a part-year only.

Same-sex couples in a civil partnership have been able to convert their existing civil partnership into a marriage since 10 December 2014. These conversions are included in the number of marriages taking place but are reported separately in Table 13.

presentation.titlePublic: Share of men or women ever been married for 1980 birth cohort by a certain age

descriptionKey: Data covers marriages legally registered in England and Wales, including marriages of residents that take place outside England and Wales.
Marriages between same-sex couples became legal on 29 March 2014, so the 2014 figures include only same-sex marriages that took place from that date onward.
Civil partnerships converted into marriages are included, and are counted as marriages that previously had "never married or civil partnered" status when prior marital status is unknown.

origins.title: Marriages in England and Wales
origins.description: Number of marriages that took place in England and Wales by age, sex, previous partnership status and civil or religious ceremony.
origins.citationFull: Office for National Statistics (ONS), ONS website, dataset, Marriages in England and Wales, UK. Retrieved 7 October 2025.
